welcome.description: This is a resource to assist users in determining IF and WHEN an arrest, charge or convictionon a D.C. criminal record MAY be eligible for sealing or for fixing errors on your record.  More information on the benefits of sealing or correcting your record can be found when you click on the FAQs section.
welcome.disclaimer: This site does not constitute a legal service and is not intended to provide legal advice. If you are unsure about any questions, you should speak with a lawyer (for free!) through the Community Defender Division of the Public Defender Service of DC.
welcome.agreement: By using www.cleanslateDC.com you agree to the privacy policy and terms of use.
welcome.agreementUnderstood: Ok, I understand. Let's Get Started
